alert.note: Alert for Bronx; Northern Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued December 22 at 4:08PM EST until December 23 at 1:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 1 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...One to two feet of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Bronx, Northwest Suffolk, Northern Queens and Northern Nassau Counties. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 1 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...There is potential for widespread moderate flooding of vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline, with up to 2 feet of inundation above ground level in low lying, vulnerable areas. This will result in numerous road closures and cause widespread flooding of low lying property including parking lots, parks, lawns and homes/businesses with basements near the waterfront. Vehicles parked in vulnerable areas near the waterfront will likely become flooded. Flooding will also extend inland from the waterfront along tidal rivers and bays. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. LITTLE NECK BAY AT KINGS POINT NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 10.0 FT, MODERATE 10.5 FT, MAJOR 13.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 2.2 FT, MODERATE 2.7 FT, MAJOR 5.2 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 22/11 PM 9.7/10.2 1.9/ 2.3 2.5/ 3.0 1-3 NONE 23/10 AM 11.6/12.1 3.7/ 4.2 2.7/ 3.2 0-1 MODERATE 23/11 PM 5.7/ 6.2 -2.0/-1.6 -1.8/-1.3 2 NONE 24/11 AM 7.3/ 7.8 -0.6/-0.1 -1.7/-1.2 2 NONE 25/12 AM 6.0/ 6.5 -1.9/-1.4 -1.7/-1.2 1-2 NONE 25/12 PM 7.8/ 8.3 0.0/ 0.5 -1.0/-0.5 1 NONE &&
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
